document.full_text: with miami trailing dallas 2-0 in the 2006 nba finals, dwyane wade took charge for the heat and carried them to four straight wins over dirk nowitzki and the mavericks for the team's first and only title to date.
document.title: wade braced for improved nowitzki in finals rematch
lines_and_colors: with miami trailing dallas 2-0 in the 2006 nba finals, dwyane wade took charge for the heat and carried them to four straight wins over dirk nowitzki and the mavericks for the team's first and only title to date.
